page.title: 14FOOTBALL R.A.T.S.& B.R.A.T.S
page.content: The RATS are a team that were started by Melvin Foster and Brian Warren . RATS stands for Ranskill And Torworth Sports. BRATS stands for Barmby Moor,Ranskill And Torworth Sports. BRATS is the junior team 13-14 yrs old.RATS was started first in 1984.We were arguing at first but it all cleared up after a while.We won nearly every game and we got into the semi-finals.BRATS started on Sunday May 12th.We had a lot of boys go and we got a sort of team together.Next time we went we had a practice match and we got three definate players.We are still getting the team together.My dad is the manager:Winston Morris.Brian Warren is the CO-MANAGER.RATS and BRATS play at Lound and Mattersey.
